SetEnvUIConfig.DialogCaption: Deployment Framework for BizTalk Sample - IIS

SetEnvUIConfigItem.PromptText:
Is this the FIRST server in the BizTalk Group you are undeploying from?
If so, BizTalk assemblies will be un-deployed from the BizTalk Management Database.
SetEnvUIConfigItem.Caption: This is the FIRST server in the BizTalk Group
